version_description: Minor changes.

PDFitAll 3.0 is here!

New Features:
*Full power scanner with image cropping, filters and color contrasts - Scan your images like never before with this powerful scanner and create beautiful documents in seconds
*Browser with Article Cleaner - Clean your favorite articles and create a clutter free PDF documents. Also, you can now open your URLs directly from Safari with PDFitAll Action Extension
*Documents to PDF - You can now convert iWork Files (Keynote, Pages and Numbers)
*Messages to PDF - We redesigned the way you convert messages to PDF. You can now convert one page messages with our stitching tool! Try it, it's awesome!
*Notes to PDF - You can now write any PDF from scratch using this Text Editor. Ideal for creating a PDF page on the go.
*PDF Manager - Easier management of PDF Files. Create Folders, share multiple files at the same time

The app now runs faster, and it is fully compatible with iOS 10.
7 apps in 1, let us know what you think and please take a moment to review the app :)

PDFitAll 3.0 is here!

New Features:
*Full power scanner with image cropping, filters and color contrasts - Scan your images like never before with this powerful scanner and create beautiful documents in seconds
*Browser with Article Cleaner - Clean your favorite articles and create a clutter free PDF documents. Also, you can now open your URLs directly from Safari with PDFitAll Action Extension
*Documents to PDF - You can now convert iWork Files (Keynote, Pages and Numbers)
*Messages to PDF - We redesigned the way you convert messages to PDF. You can now convert one page messages with our stitching tool! Try it, it's awesome!
*Notes to PDF - You can now write any PDF from scratch using this Text Editor. Ideal for creating a PDF page on the go.
*PDF Manager - Easier management of PDF Files. Create Folders, share multiple files at the same time

The app now runs faster, and it is fully compatible with iOS 10.
7 apps in 1, let us know what you think and please take a moment to review the app :)

3.0.1 Update:
Performance improvements
Now you can configure the default image filter
Fix a bug where app would crash when camera permission was not allowed

New in V3.1:
- You can now merge multiple PDF files
- You can now edit PDF file names
- Fixed orientation issues on iPad

Tutorial section is now easier to access in order to learn all the features of PDF it All!

Thanks for all the feedback. Please take a moment to review the app in the App Store :)

V4.0 features:
+ You can now edit PDF pages by removing or rotating
+ You can now merge or split PDF files
+ You can now sign documents
+ UI improvements all across the applications
+ Support for latest iOS devices

4.1:
+ We brought back Notes to PDF
+ You can now also edit your photos with crop, filter or rotation

+ Fixed issue when reordering pages
+ Fixed issue when importing documents on iOS 12
+ Fixed issue when signing documents on iOS 12
+ Fix issue when opening Protect PDF
+ Fix issue when opening Protect PDF

+ Dark mode is now supported.

Thanks for all the feedback. Enjoy!

+ Fixed Web to PDF automatic name
+ Added a new configuration for Photos to PDF: Pixel Perfect. Convert photos to PDF without losing any quality.
+ Improved excel to PDF conversion

+ Personalize your PDFs with your logo or stamp with our new Stamp tool.
+ Performance improvements

+ Support for iOS 14 Photo Library for even more privacy
+ Reader Mode on Web to PDF
+ You can now configure PDF Size on Web to PDF
+ Scanner Mode on Photos to PDF
+ UI Improvements on Notes to PDF
+ Fixed bug where scanner and camera roll option won't appear (Thanks Anna!)

+ Fix for UI issues when dark mode is enabled
+ Fix for folder issue when naming it with quotations
(Thanks Hadi!)
+ Fix UI issue when sharing PDF

+ You can now add Text Annotations to PDF
+ Improved dark mode support
+ Performance improvements
+ Fixed crashing issue when adding stamp to PDF on iPad
